DOC.brief_summary: Benfotiamine pretreatment ( 3 day ) high dosage ( 1050 mg/day ) prevent healthy subject smoking-induced vascular dysfunction assess ultrasound flow mediate dilatation brachial artery .
DOC.brief_title: Benfotiamine Prevents Vascular Dysfunction Healthy Smokers
DOC.detailed_description: Benfotiamine pretreatment ( 3 day ) high dosage ( 1050 mg/day ) prevent healthy subject smoking-induced vascular dysfunction assess ultrasound flow mediate dilatation ( FMD ) brachial arteryand laboratory parameter ( adhesion molecule ) .
